title: Role-Based Security Training
description: A security awareness manager needs to assign specialized, role-based training to different departments.

tasks.description: Identify the different roles and their specific training needs (e.g., developers need secure coding training, finance needs training on wire fraud).
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully maps roles to required training modules.

tasks.description: Create different assignment groups in the LMS for each department (Developers, Finance, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully creates the assignment groups.

tasks.description: Assign the appropriate training modules to each group.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully assigns the correct, specialized training to each department.
